resources.string:
uBible is built because we saw the lack of intuitive Cebuano translated Bible available in the Google Play Store. uBible is a project done by the Youth of the Pentecostals of Mandaue City, United Pentecostal Church Philippines, Inc. 

Like us at https://facebook.com/upcmandaue or
follow us over at https://twitter.com/uBibleApp
